name: X Speedflow.1
description: When razor-sharp instincts flow into lightning pace, the pitch becomes your playground. Find your soccer groove in adidas X. These cleats support speed of thought and rapid feet. The Carbitex carbon-fiber insert and raised forefoot help spark explosive acceleration, and an Agilitycage straps you in for jinks and turns. The adidas PRIMEKNIT skin adds comfort and confidence.
specifications: Product color: Sky Rush / Team Shock Pink / Cloud White

name: Predator Edge+
description: Swerve. Power. Control. When you have the edge, the pitch is full of possibilities. See the beautiful game from a brand-new angle in adidas Predator. These laceless soccer cleats help you call the shots with a Zone Skin upper that has discrete ribbed sections positioned and sculpted for different types of ball contact. A weighted Power Facet in the split outsole's forefoot adds oomph to strikes. The stretchy adidas PRIMEKNIT collar locks you in as you tighten your grip on the game.
specifications: Product color: Cloud White / Hi-Res Blue / Cloud White

name: Copa Sense.1
description: Winning isn't about beating 11 players. It's about being at one with the ball. Count on adidas Copa to heighten your soccer senses. These firm ground cleats have foam Sensepods in the heel. Anatomically placed to fill every gap, they make the K-leather and knit textile upper feel like it's part of your foot. Touchpods team up with flexible Softstuds to cushion touches, ensuring you stay connected to the ball.
specifications: Product color: Team Navy / Cloud White / Blue Rush

name: Gamemode Knit
description: We all fall in love with the beautiful game on our own terms. Select your adidas Gamemode and show the world how you do football. Designed to fit a wide range of foot shapes, these boots are built for comfortable play. Their versatile outsole keeps you stable on firm ground and artificial grass. The soft, adaptive upper helps you express yourself.
specifications: Hybrid outsole for firm and artificial surfaces
Product color: Core Black / Cloud White / Clear Sky
Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content

name: Mundial Goal
description: The Mundial Goal has dominated soccer's greatest stages for decades. These professional-level men's soccer shoes feature a soft split-suede leather upper for a great fit and incredible ball touch. An EVA midsole and gum rubber outsole are specifically designed for indoor surfaces.
specifications: Die-cut EVA insole for lightweight comfort
NON MARKING gum rubber outsole for excellent grip on all indoor surfaces
Product color: Core Black / Core White / Core White

name: X Speedflow.3
description: On the pitch, speed is a virtue. On the court, it's the only thing that counts. Think fast. Move faster. Find your flow and leave the rest behind. Take everything in your stride in these adidas X indoor soccer shoes. Their semi-translucent Speedskin upper keeps you comfortable as you explode into action. Underneath, a grippy rubber outsole lays down serious acceleration on flat surfaces. The foot-hugging fit straps you in for jinks and turns to keep you one step ahead.
specifications: Product color: Red / Core Black / Solar Red
Lightweight rubber outsole for indoor surfaces

name: Copa Sense.3
description: In the chaos of the cage, the lightest touch leaves a lasting impression. Fine-tune your soccer senses in adidas Copa. Made for easy entry, these shoes mold to your foot's shape so you stay comfortable. Their soft synthetic leather forefoot has a breathable mesh quarter for composed play. The rubber outsole keeps your game purring on flat indoor surfaces.
specifications: Product color: Team Navy / Cloud White / Blue Rush
Non-marking rubber outsole for indoor surfaces

name: Predator Freaks.3
description: Walls can't contain you. Rivals can't hold you back. On the court, you're in control. Release your full force of nature in Predator Freak. These adidas indoor soccer shoes keep you stable with a supportive mid-cut design. The coated textile upper has a laceless forefoot and more extensive 3D-printed Demonscale elements to help you own the ball.
specifications: Product color: Core Black / Cloud White / Shock Pink

name: Mecurial Superfly 8 Elite
description: Embody Kylian Mbappé’s relentless pace with fiery design details. A Flyknit upper wraps your foot in lightweight fabric that moves with you when it’s time to turn up the heat.
specifications: Product color: Light Thistle / Indigo Burst / Bright Crimson / Metallic Silver

name: Phantom GT2 Dynamic Fit Elite
description: Building off the Phantom GT, the Nike Phantom GT2 Elite FG features an updated design and raised patterning to help create optimal spin to control the flight of the ball. Off-center lacing provides a clean strike zone for skillful dribbling, passing and shooting.
specifications: Product color: Laser Orange / Total Orange / Bright Crimson / Black
For use on slightly wet, short-grass fields

name: Tiempo Legend 9 Elite
description: One of our lightest Tiempos to date, the Nike Tiempo Legend 9 Elite FG lets you go on the offensive with a low-profile design that's reinvented for attackers. The upper has raised textures backed by soft foam pods for precise dribbling, passing and shooting, while studs on the bottom provide traction for quick cuts and sudden stops.
specifications: For use on slightly wet, short-grass fields
Product color: White / Bright Crimson / Pink Blast / Black

name: Mecurial Dream Speed Vapor 14 Elite
description: The Nike Mercurial Dream Speed Vapor 14 Elite embodies Cristiano Ronaldo’s greatest self-proclaimed strength: the power of the mind and meditation. Calming shades of green work together with energizing tones of purple and yellow, resulting in a cleat that radiates positivity.
specifications: For use on slightly wet, short-grass fields
Product color: Barely Green / Electro Purple / Aurora Green / Volt

name: Streetgato
description: Rule the streets in the Nike Streetgato. They blend performance details with streetwear flair so you can be ready to play at any moment.
specifications: Product color: Black / Cyber Teal / Metallic Vivid Gold / Volt

name: Phantom GT2 Academy Dynamic Fit
description: Building on the Phantom GT, the Nike Phantom GT2 Dynamic Fit IC has an updated design and patterning that are engineered to help you place your shots with pinpoint accuracy. Off-center lacing provides a clean strike zone to help you dribble, pass and score with precision.
specifications: Off-center lacing creates a larger sweet spot
For use on street, court and indoor surfaces
Product color: Black / Metallic Gold / Dark Grey / Metallic Dark Grey

name: Mecurial Vapor 14 Club IC
description: The Nike Mercurial Vapor 14 Club IC sets you up for speed on street, court and indoor surfaces. A herringbone pattern on the bottom provides better trapping during small-sided games, and a grippy texture throughout the top gives you precise control of the ball.
specifications: For traction on street, court and indoor surfaces

name: Premier 3 IC
description: The Nike Premier 3 gets back to the basics, featuring a timeless silhouette wrapped in supple leather to help keep you moving confidently as an unstoppable force on the court.
specifications: Fold-over tongue features a cut line
For use on street, court and indoor surfaces

name: First Mile Future Z 1.2
description: The future is here. A pair of soccer cleats engineered for unparalleled fit, designed to transfer your energy directly to the pitch and crafted with superior traction for explosive multidirectional movements. This is a progressive and dynamic boot, laden with innovative technology, for players looking to take their game to the next level, and beyond.
specifications: Highly technical and flexible engineered upper
Product color: Intense Blue / Ivory Glow / Puma Black / Mineral Yellow

name: King Top
description: The PUMA King is soccer royalty. It’s been in the game since 1968 and has been worn by soccer legends from Pele to Matthaus. Originally engineered in Italy, the King Top features a sleek leather upper and soft padded collar with a fold-over tongue. The lightweight studded outsole allows agile, versatile movement and optimal traction on the field.
specifications: Kangaroo leather vamp upper with fold-over tongue
Lightweight TPU outsole with conical studs
Contrasting PUMA Formstrip on lateral side
Product color: Puma Black / Puma White

name: Ultra 1.4
description: Take your game to the next level in these formidable cleats. Built for unbeatable speed and control, the ULTRA 1.4 FG/AG is the lightest on the market. The updated ULTRACUT upper provides multi-layered support, while MATRYXEVO carbon yarn technology combined with an updated microfiber SPEEDCAGE with cut-out windows ensures ultra-lightweight support during fast-forward motion. The ultra-fast Peba SpeedUnit outsole is inspired by running spike technology for explosive acceleration, while the GripControl Pro's uniquely textured skin gives added ball control and confidence. In these boots, you'll be a force to be reckoned with on both hard natural surfaces and artificial grass.
specifications: SpeedUnit outsole infused with running spike DNA
Product color: Diamond Silver / Neon Citrus
Updated SPEEDCAGE for lightweight support during fast-forward motion

name: King Platinum 21 VGN
description: Here's a 100% vegan soccer cleat that offers fantastic touch qualities plus the comfort and class you'd expect from something bearing the name King. The KINGForm technology in key contact areas will give you increased touch and increased responsiveness, while the super lightweight outsole is built for stability and exceptional freedom of movement.
specifications: Super soft vegan upper for ultimate touch and feel on the ball
KINGForm technology in key contact areas to increase touch and responsiveness
Product color: Ivory Glow / Puma Black /Green Glare

name: King Top TT
description: The PUMA King is soccer royalty. It’s been in the game since 1968 and has been worn by soccer legends from Pele to Matthaus. Originally engineered in Italy, the King Top features a sleek leather upper and soft padded collar with a fold-over tongue. The low-profile rubber outsole features strategically placed studs for versatile movement and traction on the field.
specifications: Product color: Puma Black / Puma White
Suitable for use on hard natural surfaces and synthetic grass

name: Ultra 3.4 TT
description: These lightweight cleats will help you fly past that defender and slam the ball in the back of the net with ease. The ULTRA 3.4 features a lightweight mesh with an updated SPEEDCAGE fused to a running spike-inspired SpeedUnit outsole – this construction is designed to offer enhanced grip for improved speed.
specifications: Lightweight mesh upper with updated SPEEDCAGE
Knitted collar for a snug fit around the ankle
Product color: Festival Fuchsia /Neon Citrus / Parisian Night

name: Future Z 3.3 TT
description: Sleek, streamlined and sophisticated, the FUTURE Z 3.3 is designed for fierce soccer. Featuring the second generation of our FUZIONFIT+ technology, each shoe adapts to the shape of your foot, ensuring an optimal fit and the ideal balance between support and flexibility–with or without laces. Advanced Creator Zones positioned at the forefoot deliver exceptional ball control and touch at high speeds, while a lightweight and supremely reactive outsole suitable for turf training provides superior traction. Elegant yet agile, with a slip-on construction for comfort and convenience, plus bold PUMA branding and cool colour combinations that stand out with style, you'll be playing like the pros.
specifications: Highly technical and soft engineered upper
Advanced Creator Zones provide superior touch
Product color: Puma White / Ocean Dive /Puma Black

name: Future Z 1.2 Pro Cage
description: A carefully constructed fit combined with an integrated heel counter and micro-perforated padding create the perfect conditions for dynamic agility on the pitch. A mid-foot compression band and low-profile multi-studded outsole join forces to anchor your foot securely, while the textured upper is engineered to enhance ball grip. This flexible, comfortable football boot is ready to take you to your limits – and beyond.
specifications: Flexible, textured upper to enhance ball grip
Lace closure for a snug fit
Product color: Puma Black / Green Glare / Puma White
